about_the_game:
Ella is an autistic girl with blurry memories in the world of sand. She faced many difficulties alone, and with the help of many friends, she bravely moved forward, constantly collected memory fragments to find herself, and faced challenges such as pain, depression, and war one by one, and finally grow up bravely.

This is a sand painting style game, which gradually shows Ella's journey of growth and transformation. It needs to constantly explore and collect, cross many organ checkpoints, and finally achieve the wish after collecting all the memories.

The game shows Ella's dream. In the plot, Ella gradually looks for all the memory fragments in the dream and recalls all the past events. And with the help of everyone, he gradually grows up and continues to overcome all kinds of hardships.

We are BluSped Game Studio, engaged in indie game development. This is our new game. We hope you like it.
